      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Climate change</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimaänderung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changement de climat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança do clima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento di clima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλαγή κλίματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambio del clima</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Climate change is a key issue on today’s social and political agenda. This unit explores the basic science that underpins climate change and global warming.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Aerosols</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Albedo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Atmosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Climate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Climate_change</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Environment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Glaciations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Greenhouse-effect</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Radiative_forcing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Sea_levels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimaänderung ist eine Schlüsselausgabe auf den 
Sozial today?s und politischer Tagesordnung. Diese Maßeinheit 
erforscht die grundlegende Wissenschaft, die Klimaänderung und das 
globale Wärmen untermauert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le changement de climat est une question clé aux 
today?s sociaux et à l'ordre du jour politique. Cette unité 
explore la science de base qui soutient le changement de climat et le 
chauffage global.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A mudança do clima é uma edição chave nos 
today?s sociais e na agenda política. Esta unidade explora a 
ciência básica que underpins a mudança do clima e se aquecer 
global.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il cambiamento di clima è un punto chiave sui 
today?s sociali e sull'ordine del giorno politico. Questa unità
esplora la scienza di base che sostiene il cambiamento di clima ed il 
riscaldamento globale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αλλαγή κλίματος είναι ένα βασικό ζήτημα σε 
κοινωνική και πολιτική ημερήσια διάταξη today?s. Αυτή η 
μονάδα ερευνά τη βασική επιστήμη που υποστηρίζει την αλλαγή 
κλίματος και την παγκόσμια αύξηση της θερμοκρασίας λόγω του 
φαινομένου του θερμοκηπίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cambio del clima es una cuestión clave en los 
today?s sociales y agenda política. Esta unidad explora la 
ciencia básica que sostiene el cambio del clima y calentarse global.</string>
          </description>
